title: Renai Pâtisserie
description:
Zero experience points, shy and pure patissier Erio and Kai, a writer with a mysterious past. Kai is a regular guest at Erio's shop and always messes with Erio, but they are soon drawn to each other...

As well as the title cut depicting the sweet and wet love of the two, this book contains other sweet and sexy short stories.

[b]Second story[/b] is about a teacher and his student.

[b]Third story[/b] is about a magical cat-spirit (kettoshi) kingdom, and a young kettoshi's journey to adulthood.*

[b]Fourth story[/b] is about Saki, a kettoshi who is suffering from an unrequited love in mating season.

[b]Fifth story[/b] is about two kettoshi who are living as cats in the human world. One is being set up for a mating session with a female cat... will the other try and stop the situation?

[b]Sixth story[/b] is about a boy who was wham-bam-thankyouman'd and has decided to seek his revenge by stalking his ex, who turns out to be a kettoshi. Will revenge be taken, or something else?

Extra about Kai's past.

[b]*[/b]Could be considered shota. Boy is 14.
